duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and manage Anaplan models to meet client/internal team requirements.
Gather requirements and design data inputs, outputs, calculations, and business processes in Anaplan.
Work with clients and/or internal team members to ensure Anaplan models meet specific business needs.
Utilize strong knowledge of the Anaplan platform and business processes to build effective Anaplan models.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
